Package com.pelzer.util.l10n.localizers

Class Summary
LanguageLocalizer Used to localize based on ISO 639-2 3-letter language codes (English would be 'eng')
LanguageLocalizerBeanInfo  
Localizer Wrapper for language or territory.
LocalizerBeanInfo Specifies how to serialize a Localizer object using XMLEncoder
LocalizerBeanInfo.LocalizerPersistenceDelegate  
ScriptLocalizer Used to localize based on ISO 15924 script codes (English would be 'latn' for Latin)
ScriptLocalizerBeanInfo  
TerritoryLocalizer Used to localize based on two character ISO 3166 territory codes (United States would be 'US'), or 'WW' (which is not an official code)
TerritoryLocalizerBeanInfo
